name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jennifer Ann KERSTETTER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jennifer Ann KERSTETTER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of August 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
Did the Commonwealth Court of Pennsylvania err when it held that a kindergarten student under the age of eight years is of compulsory school age pursuant to Pennsylvania’s Compulsory School Attendance laws codified at 24 Pa.C.S. § 13-1327?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
73 A.3d 576
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jennifer Ann KERSTETTER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 22, 2013.
